# Jogeshwari East metro station

Jogeshwari (East) is an elevated metro station on the North-South corridor of the Red Line 7 of Mumbai Metro in Mumbai, India. This metro station was inaugurated on  by Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

Power and signaling system
Like all other stations and railways of Mumbai metro, Jogeshwari (East) station also uses 25,000 volt AC power system by overhead catenary to operate the trains.
